problem_data.title: Valid Triangle Number
problem_data.description: Given an integer array nums, return the number of triplets chosen from the array that can make triangles if we take them as side lengths of a triangle.

examples.explanation:
Valid combinations are:
2,3,4 (using the first 2)
2,3,4 (using the second 2)
2,2,3
